water.title: Smart Water Analysis
water.subtitle: Groundwater Intelligence System
water.description: Our system utilizes real-time API integrations with Central Ground Water Board (CGWB) data to provide hyper-local water scarcity predictions.
details: Tracks district-level groundwater fluctuation trends (Decadal mean).
Correlates rainfall deflection with aquifer recharge rates.
Predicts 'Critical' or 'Over-exploited' blocks before planting season.

crop.title: AI Crop Recommendation
crop.subtitle: Optimal Yield Engine
crop.description: The recommendation engine analyzes soil health, water availability, and market trends to suggest the most profitable and sustainable crops for your specific plot.
details: Matches crop water requirements with anticipated available water.
Suggests drought-resistant varieties (e.g., Millets) in low-water zones.
Rotational cropping logic to maintain soil nitrogen levels.

risk.title: Crop Risk Assessment
risk.subtitle: Failure Probability Model
risk.description: A sophisticated Random Forest Machine Learning model that calculates the precise probability of crop failure based on multi-dimensional risk factors.
details: Analyzes historical failure patterns in your district.
Factors in extreme weather events (heatwaves, unseasonal rain).
Provides actionable mitigation strategies to lower computed risk.
